title: 1997 Mercedes Benz E 420
item_description:
1997 Mercedes Benz E 420

Specifications

  • Year: 1997
  • Make: Mercedes Benz
  • Model: E 420
  • VIN: WDBJF72F8VA214523
  • License: 3TJB187
    • Registration Expiration: 9/22/2023
    • Planned Non-Op Registration
  • Key: Available
  • GVWR: 4,760 Lbs
  • Body Style: Sedan
  • Fuel Type: Gasoline
  • Transmission: Automatic
  • Tire Size: 215/70R16

Exterior

  • Exterior Color: Silver
  • Doors: Four Door

Interior

  • Interior Material: Leather
  • Interior Color: Gray
  • Does NOT Start

Note: Application for Replacement Title or Certificate of Title and Transfer Form will be mailed 3-4 weeks after removal. The Seller sells this vehicle "as-is" in non-running condition in planned non-operational registration with no smog performed by the Seller. The Buyer agrees to purchase the vehicle "as-is" and agrees to repair and smog vehicle. An "as-is" no-smog bill of sale must be signed by both buyer/seller in an agreement to these stated terms. Buyer is fully responsible for all aspects of smog, repairs to smog if needed, transfer, registration, taxes, and fees due to California DMV.
